content: TE 2-22 Cordless rotary hammer Compact and light weight SDS Plus cordless rotary hammer with pistol grip for best maneuverability when drilling overhead (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Rotary hammers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unbeatable grip and agility – TE 2-22 is our lightest and slimmest cordless rotary hammer, with improved in-line pistol grip designed to help you work in cramped quarters without the muscle strain Virtually dust-free drilling – when used with a Hilti DRS-D or DRS-S dust removal attachment or hollow drill bit and compatible Hilti vacuum cleaner Safer work at heights – use the included belt hook and optional tool tether to free your hands without compromising on tool drop protection Improved drilling precision – LED light provides better visibility of your work area, and the enhanced grip provides more comfortable control On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, power-saving drill bits and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Drilling into concrete and masonry, especially overhead or in tight spaces Interior finishing – installing drywall track and suspended ceilings Metal fabrication – fastening metal fixtures to concrete, such as handrails, staircases, sun blinds and safety barriers Electrical and telecom – installing cables, switchgear, outlet boxes and lights Any smaller drilling jobs, when cordless convenience and comfortable handling is more efficient overall than minimizing the time-per-fastening ### TECHNICAL DATA: Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery: 5.1 lb. Optimum Hammer drilling range: 5/32 - 15/32 in Single impact energy: 1.1 ft-lbs Technical Data | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 5.1 lb | Optimum Hammer drilling range | 5/32 - 15/32 in | Single impact energy | 1.1 ft-lbs | Hammer drilling diameter range | 5/32 - 7/8 in | Hammer drilling RPM | 1090 rpm | Full hammering frequency | 4860 impacts/minute | Functionality | Reverse mode, Working light LED | A-weighted emission sound power level | 103 dB (A) | 1 | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 95 dB (A) | 2 | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3951583 - TE 2-22 Performance Package - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2-22 Cordless rotary hammer assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml - 1x TE-CX 3/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4- 4 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 1/4-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 3/8-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX(5) 1/2-6 Hammer drill bit - 1x TE-CX 5/16-6 Hammer drill bit - 2256700 - Cordless Rotary Hammer TE 2-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x TE 2-22 Cordless rotary hammer assy - 1x Hilti Grease 50ml
